ourStory.title: Our Story
ourStory.p1: Kalsh Hardware was founded in 1995 with a simple mission: to provide high-quality hardware tools and exceptional customer service. What began as a small family business has grown into a trusted name in the industry.
ourStory.p2: With over 25 years of experience, we've built a reputation for reliability, expertise, and a commitment to customer satisfaction. Our team of experts is passionate about helping customers find the right tools for their projects.
ourStory.p3: Today, we continue to expand our product range and services, while staying true to our core values of quality, integrity, and customer focus.

missionVision.title: Our Mission & Vision
missionVision.subtitle: Driven by purpose, guided by our vision
missionVision.missionText: To provide high-quality hardware tools and equipment, exceptional customer service, and expert advice to help our customers successfully complete their projects.
missionVision.visionText: To be the most trusted and preferred hardware supplier, recognized for our product quality, expertise, and customer-focused approach.

team.title: Meet Our Team

member1.name: Rajesh Sharma
member1.bio: Rajesh founded Kalsh Hardware in 1995 and has over 30 years of experience in the hardware industry. His vision and leadership have been instrumental in the company's growth.

member2.name: Priya Patel
member2.bio: Priya oversees our day-to-day operations, ensuring that we maintain the highest standards of quality and service.

member3.name: Amit Verma
member3.bio: With extensive knowledge of tools and equipment, Amit helps customers find the perfect solutions for their projects.
